channel.title: Articles, on elliott.io
channel.description: Recent content in Articles, on elliott.io

item.description: Richard Buchanan was a professor at Carnegie Mellon's Design School before leaving for the Weatherhead School of Management at Case Western. He's a personal hero of mine, and one of the few people moving design into spaces that were previously owned by business and management. He recently gave a keynote talk at COINs and you should definitely check it out on livestream [here](http://www.livestream.com/newchannel/popoutplayer?channel=coinsconference&clip=flv_10da17fe-85ac-4b06-b9eb-ace1a97058d7). The general gist of the talk informed the audience of the true nature of design, design thinking, and how it's going to make it's way into management.
